ext_descriptions.ext_description: The boolean_operator_3d type enumerates the three boolean operators used in the definition of CSG solids.

The csg_primitive_3d type enumerates the solid primitives that can be represented by an instance of Csg_item_3d.
This enumeration may be extended in application modules that use the present module.
The definition of the various primitives can be obtained in ISO 10303-42.

The swept_area_solid_type type enumerates the kinds of swept_area_solid.
This enumeration may be extended in application modules that use the present module.
The definition of the various kinds of swept_area_solid can be obtained in ISO 10303-42.

The swept_face_solid_type type enumerates the kinds of swept_face_solid.
This enumeration may be extended in application modules that use the present module.
The definition of the various kinds of swept_face_solid can be obtained in ISO 10303-42.
A Solid_model is a type of 3D Detailed_geometric_model_element that defines the representation of a solid volume.

A Solid_replica is a replica of a Solid_model obtained with a particular geometric transformation. The transformation may not be an isometry.
A Solid_replica may be used to represent a copy of a Solid_model in a different location.
the Solid_model that is replicated.
the Cartesian_transformation_3d used to create the replica.

A Swept_area_solid is a type of Solid_model that is obtained sweeping a planar bounded surface along a path.
Specification of this entity is incomplete in the ARM. Further information can be obtained in the specification of the entity onto which it is mapped.
the identification of the kind of Swept_area_solid that is specified.

A Swept_face_solid is a type of Solid_model that is obtained sweeping a planar face along a path.
Specification of this entity is incomplete in the ARM. Further information can be obtained in the specification of the entity onto which it is mapped.
the identification of the kind of Swept_face_solid that is specified.

A Half_space_3d is a type of Detailed_geometric_model_element that is the domain of space which lies on one side of an unbounded surface.
The surface shall divide the space domain into exactly two subsets.
The domain may be trimmed by an orthogonal box.
Specification of this entity is incomplete in the ARM. Further information can be obtained in the specification of the entity onto which it is mapped.
The side of the surface which determines the half space is obtained from the surface normal.

ext_description.p: A Csg_model is a type of Solid_model defined by a collection of so-called primitive solids, combined using regularised boolean operations. The allowed operations are intersection, union and difference.
ext_description.note: As a special case, a Csg_model can also include of a single CSG primitive.

A regularised subset of space is the closure of its interior, in the usual sense of point set topology. For boolean results, regularization has the effect of removing dangling edges and other anomalies produced by the original operations.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the Boolean_result_3d or the Csg_item_3d that defines the Csg_model.

A Boolean_result_3d is a type of Detailed_geometric_model_element that specifies a result of a boolean operation between instances of the types listed in boolean_operand_3d type.
The final Boolean_result_3d depends upon the operation and the two operands. In the case of the difference operator, the order of the operands is significant.
the first operand to be operated upon by the boolean operation.
the second operand specified for the operation.

A Manifold_solid_brep is a type of Solid_model that defines a solid by its external envelope and, when relevant, by one or more inner envelopes.
These envelopes shall either be defined with connected planar and polygonal facets or with scupltured surfaces.
the boolean value that specifies whether the envelopes of the Manifold_solid_brep are faceted.

A Csg_item_3d is a type of Detailed_geometric_model_element that defines a 3D solid primitive.
Specification of this entity is incomplete in the ARM. Further information can be obtained in the specification of the entity onto which it is mapped.
the identification of the kind of solid shape that is specified.
